title: Bitfarms to Wind Down Bitcoin Mining to Focus on AI Data Centers
description: Bitfarms Ltd., one of the largest cryptocurrency miners, said it plans to wind down those operations over the next two years and focus on providing infrastructure to generate computing power for artificial intelligence applications.
content:

title: and more uncertainty for Michigan's job market
description: Michigan employers are slowing hiring and holding off on major investments amid economic uncertainty tied to tariffs and artificial intelligence.
content:
Michigan employers are slowing hiring and holding off on big investments. Layoffs have also eased for now.
That holding pattern is leading to a decline in Michigan's labor force, a measure of people working or actively looking for work, as fewer comp... [8128 chars]

title: Watch this AI robot face-plant onstage during Russia debut
description: A humanoid robot powered by artificial intelligence, known as AIDOL, tumbled during its highly anticipated debut appearance at a Moscow tech show.
content:
A humanoid robot’s highly anticipated debut quickly went awry when it stumbled onstage at a technology showcase in Moscow on Tuesday.
Backed by the theme song of “Rocky,” the robot, accompanied by two people, waddled onto the stage before a room full... [301 chars]

title: William Lively Bridges Fintech and Philanthropy to Empower Minnesota Communities
description: In Minneapolis, William Lively has spent his career using technology to bring more transparency to finance.
